body: People who were falsely banned for hacking should be unbanned because it's not fair for them, to get banned by hacking when they are not hacking.

replies.body:
As states above, if you were falsely banned for "hacking" you can submit an appeal. Us Moderators are human, and humans makes mistakes. I'm going to go ahead and lock this due to the fact that it's creating spam. Thank you for understanding :)
